sentences: Igal juhul mind jätke mängust välja!
Kuid igal juhul pidi ta üle tammi saama.
Ants on igal juhul päris tubli poiss.
context: The word 'juhul' in Estonian is the adessive singular form of 'juht' meaning 'case'. It's commonly used as part of the phrase 'igal juhul' which means 'in any case', 'regardless', or 'no matter what'. This phrase is used to emphasize that something will happen under all circumstances, no matter what other factors might be present.
